name: World War Donut
description:
when Humans think of invasion of other species or entities,  we often think of aliens and demons but the real danger was in our local Donut shop.

Update v1.1 was released as of (6/18/2020)

features 

new reload function 

gun sounds lowered from 0.9 to 0.4 

new wave system added 

new how to play scene 

Thank you for playing and comment any suggestions you have
